meanings.sent1: I placed the new book on the bookshelf.
meanings.sent2: The bookshelf in the library is full of interesting books.
meanings.sent3: The bookshelf groaned under the weight of all the books piled on it.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a bookshelf overflowing with knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The bookshelf stood tall, a silent guardian of countless stories.

meanings.definition: A piece of furniture with shelves for storing books.
meanings.sent1: The bookshelf in the living room is made of sturdy wood.
meanings.sent2: She organized her books neatly on the bookshelf.
meanings.sent3: The bookshelf seemed to be playing hide and seek with the missing books.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a bookshelf filled with memories of their time together.
meanings.sent5: The bookshelf beckoned, promising literary adventures within its wooden embrace.
